name: RECORDINGS003: balsamic
release_bio: The third release from the RECORDINGS WRC imprint.
Sample pack of field recordings taken across the world.
Recorded, Mixed, and Mastered by Robert Dylan Smock (dyl_pykl)

name: He Called Me Beautiful (Remixes)
release_bio: The 57rd release from WHY Record Company (WRC) - WHY057
"He Called Me Beautiful" (Remixes) by Katie Hoffstatter, dyl_pykl (Robert Dylan Smock), & Matyb (Matt Benjamin)
Original song Recorded and Produced by Robert Dylan Smock & Matt Benjamin
Songwriting and Vocals by Katie Hoffstatter
Remixes by StratosFear, whythough?, dyl_pykl, ofoot, & ____
Mixed by Robert Dylan Smock & Ian Rios
Artwork originally by Katie Hoffstatter and remixed by Ian Rios
